author: Simon Difford
description: A White Negroni usually consists of equal parts all three ingredients but this "Mellow" rendition has one-sixth parts bittersweet gentian liqueur.
name: Mellow White Negroni
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
7.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
